Description: Deploys Contrail Command and an OpenShift MAster, an Infra rinning Contrail SDN Controller, three Computes into three regions of a private VPC

VPCCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
VPCCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for entire management control VPC.

PublicSubnetCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PublicSubnetCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for the public subnet

PrivateSubnetCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnetCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet AZ1

PrivateSubnetCIDR1GatewayIP.ConstraintDescription: parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x
PrivateSubnetCIDR1GatewayIP.Description: Gateway IP used by contrail command to nat to the controllers in AZ2 AZ3

PrivateSubnetCIDR2.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnetCIDR2.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet AZ2

PrivateSubnetCIDR3.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnetCIDR3.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet AZ3

DeployContrailCommand.Description: if true we will deploy contrail command

DeployHighlyAvailable.Description: note completed yet, if true we will deploy the masters and infras in HA

OpenShiftInfraAZ1PrivateIP.Description: AZ1 OpenShift Infra private static IP

OpenShiftInfraAZ2PrivateIP.Description: AZ2 OpenShift Infra private static IP

OpenShiftInfraAZ3PrivateIP.Description: AZ3 OpenShift Infra private static IP

OpenShiftMasterAZ1PrivateIP.Description: AZ1 OpenShift Master private static IP

OpenShiftMasterAZ2PrivateIP.Description: AZ2 OpenShift Master private static IP

OpenShiftMasterAZ3PrivateIP.Description: AZ3 OpenShift Master private static IP

OpenShiftNodeAZ1PrivateIP.Description: AZ1 OpenShift Node private static IP

OpenShiftNodeAZ2PrivateIP.Description: AZ2 OpenShift Node private static IP

OpenShiftNodeAZ3PrivateIP.Description: AZ3 OpenShift Node private static IP

UserLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used for OAM access to CC and if running HA the load balancer, both on internet. Typically your laptop /32. If left blank we will add 0.0.0./0 and allow ssh from anywhere
UserLocation.ConstraintDescription: Put your Client IP here x.x.x.x/32, if you leave it blank then 0.0.0.0/0 will be populated and the internet will be able access your deployments UI and SSH

SGSubnet1.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Minion subnet for example. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet2.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Minion subnet for example. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet3.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Minion subnet for example. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet4.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Minion subnet for example. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

OpenShiftAppDNSSubDomain.Description: RedHat OpenShift Domain to use for apps exposed to the router pod

PodIPAM.Description: The IPAM subnet range to use for the PODs. This is used by all namespaces so it typicaly very large, a /12 for example

ServiceIPAM.Description: The IPAM subnet range to use for the Services. This is used by all namespaces so it typicaly very large, a /12 for example

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Contrail Comand, public and on internet

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the Contrail Comand UI
allow access to the Contrail Comand API
allow access to the AZ1 Contrail UI
allow access to the Contrail Infra 1 Analytics API
allow access to the Contrail Infra 1 Controller API
allow access to the AZ2 Contrail UI
allow access to the AZ3 Contrail UI
allow access to the AZ1 OpenShift UI
allow access to the AZ2 OpenShift UI
allow access to the AZ3 OpenShift UI
allow Contrail Controller AZ1 NAT Access
allow Contrail Controller AZ1 NAT Access
allow Contrail Controller AZ1 NAT Access
allow ssh access from the client
allow ssh access from the client
allow ssh access from the client
allow ssh access from the client
allow ssh access from the client
allow access to the OpenShift apps via port 80 on the infra node
allow access to the OpenShift apps via port 443 on the infra node
allow access to the Contrail Instances within the VPC

Properties.GroupDescription: AZ1 Security group for Contrail Instances on the Private SN

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the Contrail Instances within the VPC

Properties.Description: allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet1
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet2
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet3
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet4

Properties.GroupDescription: AZ2 Security group for Contrail Instances on the Private SN

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the Contrail Instances within the VPC

Properties.Description: allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet1
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet2
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet3
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet4

Properties.GroupDescription: AZ3 Security group for Contrail Instances on the Private SN

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the Contrail Instances within the VPC

Properties.Description: allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet1
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet2
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet3
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet4

# patch: Disable cockpit as it slows down the installation
